titles.title: BAN Fossil Fuel Exports Act
BAN Fossil Fuel Exports Act
Block All New Fossil Fuel Exports Act
A bill to amend the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to reinstate the ban on the export of crude oil and natural gas produced in the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Block All New Fossil Fuel Exports Act or the BAN Fossil Fuel Exports Act
This bill requires the President to ban the exportation of crude oil and natural gas produced in the United States. The President may provide an exemption to the ban in specified circumstances.
